programme.title: Kasi Setel Itu Lirik! Ep05

programme.desc: Kombinasi 5 sketsa pendek yang berlainan dan di lakonkan oleh artis artis yang berlainan. Setiap sketsa membawa tema, set up dan penceritaan yang berbeza mengenai ragam manusia.

programme.title: Oggy & the Cockroaches Ep72

programme.title: Orang Ketiga S2 Ep84
programme.desc: Afifah, suri rumah hidup dalam kemewahan. Dia merasa hidupnya cukup sempurna, mempunyai seorang anak dan suami yang berkerjaya. Dia sering cemburu dan curiga pada perempuan muda, disekeliling suaminya.

programme.title: My Darling Inspektor Daniel Ep12
programme.desc: Maya paranoid apabila ada 'stalker' cuba mendekatinya. Maya membuat laporan polis. Inspektor Daniel ditugaskan untuk menguruskan kes itu. Mereka berdua mula rapat menyebabkan Inspektor Hannah cemburu.

programme.title: Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka Ep27

programme.title: Dia Semanis Honey Ep09
programme.desc: Ahnaf akhirnya mengaku bahawa sepanjang 3 tahun berpisah dengan Hani dia tidak pernah sekalipun melupakan Hani.

programme.desc: A woman sets up a troubled love triangle involving 2 swordsmen (Ti Lung and Lau Wing) and an enchanting lady (Ching Li).

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: In this 'Brave Archer' sequel, Kuo Tsing's (Alexander Fu Sheng) love for Huang Yung (Niu Niu) is challenged by Ouyang Fung.

programme.title: The Venus Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Two master jewel thieves are set on the same target, but sparks fly between them when they first meet and they fall instantly in love, not knowing that they are rivals.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: Loyal to the emperor, the protagonist attempts to stop the delivery of a message depicted across twelve gold medallions that is to be delivered by traitors.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: In this award-winning classic, a beauty disguises herself as a boy to attend school yet tend to her lover. Stars Lo Ti, Ling Po.

programme.title: 7 Years of Night
programme.desc: One night, Hyun Su drove home drunk & accidentally killed a girl. He hid the body to cover up his crime but when the death is discovered, her father vows to have revenge on the killer.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Winner of 9 awards at the 32nd Hong Kong Film Awards! When a police van is hijacked, Deputy Commissioner M.B Lee launches a rescue operation codenamed Cold War.

programme.title: The Wedding Diary
programme.desc: A fisherman's son plans to marry the daughter of a rich developer. He promises a grand wedding but the cost is too high. He goes gambling and loses everything! Will the wedding go on?

programme.title: Scheme with Me
programme.desc: Two top swindlers are drawn together in a daring plot to steal a trainload of gold belonging to warlord-funding Japanese conspirators. Yet, they are not alone.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: The members of an internet suicide room decide to end their lives using explosives - but when every attempt somehow pushes them back in time, they suspect the issue to be their youngest member.

programme.title: House of Wolves
programme.desc: Francis & Ronald co-star in this Hong Kong comedy about an imposter posing as an ALS patient and a devious bully, who both fall for the same pregnant woman.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: A girl who faces bullying and humiliation in school. A boy who struggles to come to terms with having a family with close ties to the underworld. What binds them together and what drives them to kill?

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Claire works for Sammy, the CEO of a cosmetics company. She has a shot at a better life when a billionaire pursues her and asks Sammy for help- without realizing her feelings for him.

programme.title: Sword Master
programme.desc: Director Derek Yee reproduces a 40-year old masterpiece & garners five HKFA award nominations for it. This dazzler stars Lin Geng Xin, Peter Ho & Jiang Yi Yan.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A self-assured chief inspector begins to second-guess himself after a fainting spell damages his short-term memory - and indicates he may be a serial killer.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: When the windshield of an airplane shatters at 30,000 feet in the air, the pilot and the crew attempt the impossible. Based on the miraculous landing of Sichuan Airlines flight 8633.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: This modern-day Cinderella story brings together a man and a woman, who not only come from different worlds but get off on the wrong foot. Will their differences ruin their chance at love?

programme.title: The Photograph
programme.desc: When the estranged daughter of a late famed photographer discovers a photograph tucked away in a safe-deposit box, she finds herself on a journey delving into her mother's early life.

programme.title: An American Pickle
programme.desc: An immigrant worker falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly, and when he emerges in present day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set Ep918
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Tracy Turnblad wins the heart of hunk Link Larkin and kicks down the barriers to racial integration on local television without messing up her hair!

programme.title: The Lost Husband
programme.desc: Trying to put her life back together after the death of her husband, Libby and her children move to her estranged Aunt's goat farm in central Texas.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Artist Clare Abshire shares a deep emotional bond with Henry De Tamble, a handsome librarian who travels involuntarily through time.

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: An NYPD detective is thrust into a citywide manhunt for a pair of cop killers after uncovering a conspiracy. The authorities close all 21 bridges to prevent the killers from escaping Manhattan.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: A family spanning three generations comes together over a weekend at their country house to be with their terminally ill mother for one last time.

programme.title: Target Number One
programme.desc: An investigative reporter fights to expose the twisted truth behind a heroin bust orchestrated by dirty cops to frame an innocent man -- sentencing him to life in a Thai prison.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Three aspiring performers discover that the path to superstardom is strewn with obstacles and difficult decisions. Stars Jamie Foxx and Beyonce Knowles

programme.title: An American Pickle
programme.desc: An immigrant worker falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly, and when he emerges in present day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A prisoner and a CIA agent have to learn to rely on each other to survive as they make their way to South Africa.

programme.title: Run (2020)
programme.desc: Diane has raised her daughter in total isolation, controlling every move she's made since birth, and there are secrets that Chloe's only beginning to grasp.

programme.title: The White Lotus S1 Ep01
programme.desc: A social satire set at an exclusive tropical resort, THE WHITE LOTUS follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries to battle a greedy industrialist and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: House Hunters S118 Ep12
programme.desc: An engaged couple seeks a vintage home to renovate in Pennsylvania.

programme.title: Flip or Flop Vegas S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Aubrey and Bristol purchase a starter home in Las Vegas, and while it may be a small house, buyers expect the best in this town.

programme.title: Flip or Flop Vegas S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Aubrey jumps at the challenge of turning a split-level house in the Southern Highlands neighborhood of Las Vegas into a high-end bachelor pad.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Real estate and flipping expert Christina Haack helps clients transform their outdated properties into high-end homes in Southern California.

programme.title: Stay or Sell S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Foster parent Jen Baumgarten cant imagine leaving her neighborhood and giving up her neighbors' support, but she has to have more space for her family.

programme.title: Restored by the Fords S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Siblings Leanne and Steve Ford renovate a quirky midcentury modern in the Pittsburgh area.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep510

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep238

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep239
